title: The Crown Agent
description: Shortlisted for the Bloody Scotland Scottish Crime Debut of the Year​A ship adrift, all hands dead. A lighthouse keeper murdered in the night. The Crown needs man to find the truth. Doctor Mungo Lyon, his reputation tarnished by the Burke & Hare scandal, and forbidden to practise as a surgeon, is the wrong man.That’s exactly why the Crown chose him.
author: Stephen   O'Rourke
